Table of Contents
=================

* [Jupyter Book > Add a table of contents to a pageâ€™s content](https://jupyterbook.org/en/stable/structure/configure.html#add-a-table-of-contents-to-a-pages-content)

The `{tableofcontents}` directive inserts a listing of section contents
section, the subpages from {file}`_toc.yml`.

```{tableofcontents}
```
